mapper.select: select menu.id from sys_user user left join sys_user_role user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id left join sys_role role on user_role.role_id = role.id left join sys_role_menu role_menu on role.id = role_menu.role_id left join sys_menu menu on role_menu.menu_id = menu.id WHERE user.username=#{username}

select menu.perms from sys_user user left join sys_user_role user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id left join sys_role role on user_role.role_id = role.id left join sys_role_menu role_menu on role.id = role_menu.role_id left join sys_menu menu on role_menu.menu_id = menu.id WHERE user.username=#{username}
